bwwExcerpt: Originality (as in not being based on a pre-existing film or song catalog) turns out to not be the equivalent of quality in "Gettin' the Band Back Together," a tacky, witless and amateurish new pop-rock musical set in Sayreville, New Jersey, that might have been commendable had it been written and performed by high school students from Sayreville, but is a total embarrassment to find on Broadway.
showScoreExcerpt:
"A tacky, witless, and amateurish new pop-rock musical set in Sayreville, New Jersey, that might have been commendable had it been written and performed by high school students from Sayreville, but is a total embarrassment to find on Broadway...The book (which was developed through group improvisation) is hackneyed, long-winded, and awkward as it continually strives for laughs with lame setups."
